/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red and white, their colors standing out against the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The street itself is lined with trees, adding a touch of green to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the daily life and activity in this part of the city.
